title: YCHZX Hairdresser Necklace Personalized Name Birthstone - Hair Stylist Scissors Charm Pendant - Hairdresser Jewelry Gift for Hairstylist
features: Please click on ''Customize Now'' to personalize your name and Birthstone with this beauty salon statement jewelry featuring a hairstylist's pair of scissors.
Come with a delicate gift box. This necklace can hold up to 8 characters of lettering, either your name or a favorite word.
This is not only a stylish necklace, but it can also show your love for the profession of hairdresser. If you or your friend is a hair stylist, buy this cute necklace for yourself or your friend!
Material Sterling Silver 925 or Stainless Steel(Customization Options). Pendant Size 27 x 27.6MM(1.06 x 1.08INCH). Chain type Rolo Chain.
90 Days returns and exchanges service. If you have any concerns, feel free to send us a message and we will get back to you within 24 Hours.
description: This necklace is specially made for those who are professional hairdressers. It incorporates the elements of scissors and combs to clearly express the professional characteristics of hairdressers. A birthstone is inlaid where the scissors and combs intersect, and there are twelve months to choose from. This necklace can hold up to 8 characters of lettering, either your name or a favorite word. This is not only a stylish necklace, but it can also show your love for the profession of hairdresser. If you or your friend is a hair stylist, buy this cute necklace for yourself or your friend! Item type: Necklace Material: Sterling Silver 925 or Stainless Steel(Customization Options) Color: Gold,rose gold,silver Gender: Unisex Style: Trendy Pendant Size: 27*27.6MM(1.06*1.08INCH) chain length: 35"/40"/45"/50"/55"
